If you are a fan of classic link puzzles or matching games, Sweet World - Candy Link Puzzle Game is going to delight you big time.

If you have already played puzzles like a fruit puzzle game, this candy connect link blast game will be very easy for you. You just have to connect the same color candy as many as possible. As soon as you connect them, they will blast bringing you points and extra movements.

The gameplay

This sweet world brings you colorful candies, and you have to match the same type of candies to make them blast. Stay focused, find as many matching candies as possible, connect or link them with your finger and see them crush. Keep in mind; you have only a limited number of movements to connect them. Get extra movements by earning more points, and with the help of the special candies. The larger the chain per turn, the higher the score revenue! After every 50 points, you win one extra move.

There are also special candies like bombs that will earn you more points. In this connect puzzle or puzzle link game, the global leaderboard will inspire you to beat other players around the world and be the ultimate puzzle world winner.

So, if you have been searching for great, fun candy dots match link games or puzzle! Connect games for a long time; your search ends with our fantastic puzzle connection candy link game.
